title: Verify role-based authentication and authorization
description: Ensure that users can register and login according to their roles (student, faculty, college admin, recruiter, super admin) with appropriate access control and restrictions.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Register a new student account under a verified college.
Verify registration success and that student role is assigned.
Login as the newly registered student.
Verify student dashboard access only.
Attempt to access faculty or admin pages.
Verify access is denied to unauthorized pages.
Login with faculty, college admin, recruiter, and super admin accounts.
Verify each role has access only to their respective dashboards and features.

title: Assessment creation and CRUD operations
description: Validate full CRUD operations for assessments including MCQs, coding challenges, practical tasks, and mixed types with multiple difficulty levels.

steps.description: Login as faculty user.
Navigate to assessment management page.
Create an MCQ assessment with several questions and multiple difficulty levels.
Verify the assessment is saved and visible in the list.
Edit the assessment by adding a coding challenge question.
Verify the update is saved and reflected correctly.
Delete the assessment.
Verify the assessment is removed from the list.
Attempt to create an assessment without required fields.
Verify proper validation errors are shown.

title: AI-powered question generation integration
description: Verify that the AI question generation feature correctly creates valid assessment questions using the OpenAI API.

steps.description: Login as faculty.
Navigate to question generation interface.
Input prompt for question generation including topic and difficulty.
Submit request to generate questions.
Verify the returned questions are relevant, properly formatted, and appear in question bank.
Trigger question generation with invalid or empty prompts.
Verify appropriate error messages are shown and no invalid questions are created.

title: Certificate generation and QR code verification
description: Ensure certificates generated after assessments include QR codes and can be verified through the dedicated verification portal.

steps.description: Complete an assessment successfully as a student.
Trigger certificate generation from the student dashboard.
Verify the certificate PDF is generated including accurate student details and a valid QR code.
Access the certificate verification page.
Scan or input certificate QR code or ID.
Verify the certificate authenticity and linked college verification badge.
Try verification with an invalid or tampered certificate ID.
Verify verification failure and user is informed.

title: Daily quiz functionality and streak tracking
description: Test daily quiz participation workflow including streak tracking, resetting after missed days, and visual feedback.

steps.description: Login as student and navigate to daily quiz page.
Complete the daily quiz.
Verify quiz is recorded, streak count increments, and visual indicators update correctly.
Simulate next day participation and complete quiz.
Verify streak continues increasing.
Simulate missing a day without quiz participation.
Verify streak resets to zero and user is notified visually.

title: Anti-cheating measures during assessments
description: Verify enforcement of fullscreen mode, tab switch detection, and disabling of copy-paste to prevent cheating during assessments.

steps.description: Login as student and start an assessment.
Verify the assessment enforces fullscreen mode.
Attempt to switch tabs or windows while assessment is in progress.
Verify detection of tab switch and appropriate warnings or session termination.
Attempt copy-paste operations within the assessment window.
Verify copy-paste is disabled or prevented successfully.

title: Recruiter search and certificate verification without exposing academic marks
description: Ensure recruiter portal allows searching and filtering by verified skills and certificates and verifies certificates without showing academic marks or CGPA.

steps.description: Login as recruiter.
Use search and filter options to find students by skill and certification status.
Verify results only show verified skills and certificates with no academic marks or CGPA.
Select a student and use certificate verification to validate authenticity.
Verify certificate is valid and results include college verification badge.
Attempt to access academic marks or CGPA fields within recruiter portal.
Verify no academic marks or CGPA information is displayed or accessible.

title: Skill gap analysis and personalized recommendation accuracy
description: Validate that skill gap analysis reviews student assessment performance data correctly and provides relevant personalized skill development recommendations.

steps.description: Login as student and view skill gap analysis page.
Check recommendations based on completed assessments and identified weak skill areas.
Verify recommendations align logically with student's assessment results and skill gaps.
Simulate improvement by completing additional assessments with better performance.
Verify updated recommendations reflect improved skill levels.

title: Resume PDF generation includes verified skills and certificates
description: Ensure that resume generation for students outputs accurate PDFs that correctly list verified skills and certificates without errors.

steps.description: Login as student with multiple verified certificates and skills.
Generate resume PDF from the dashboard.
Verify the generated PDF contains all verified skills and certificates with correct formatting.
Open the PDF to verify visual integrity and data accuracy.
Verify no missing or incorrect data and the PDF is not corrupted.

title: College registration and verification badge enforcement
description: Test that only verified colleges can register, that students and faculty are attached correctly, and verified badges are displayed consistently across the platform.

steps.description: Attempt college registration with valid verification information.
Verify college registration approval and verified badge issuance.
Register students and faculty under the verified college.
Verify users are linked to the verified college and badges appear on user profiles and certificates.
Attempt to register an unverified college.
Verify registration is blocked or marked unverified and badges do not appear.

title: Dashboard data integrity and role-specific analytics display
description: Verify that each roleâ€™s dashboard (student, faculty, college admin, recruiter, super admin) displays correct and consistent data and analytics relevant to their scope.

steps.description: Login as student and verify assessment status, skill progress, certificates, and quiz streaks on the dashboard.
Verify data accuracy and expected visual components appear.
Login as faculty and verify management views for assessments, question banks, student performance analytics.
Verify displayed data matches backend and permissions.
Login as college admin and verify dashboard content managing college users and certificates.
Verify data integrity and permissions.
Login as recruiter and verify student search results and certificate verifications.
Verify only authorized data is shown.
Login as super admin and verify global analytics, user and college management, template controls.
Verify accuracy and completeness of data.

title: Dynamic certificate template management
description: Validate that super admins can create, update, and assign certificate templates dynamically by course, department, and issuer.

steps.description: Login as super admin.
Navigate to certificate template management page.
Create a new certificate template with custom fields and branding.
Verify the template is saved and listed.
Edit the template to change issuer logo or layout.
Verify changes are applied and visible when generating certificates.
Assign templates to specific courses or departments.
Verify certificates generated for those assignments use correct templates.
Delete or deactivate a template and ensure fallback templates are used.
Verify no broken certificate generation results.

title: UI components and responsive design verification across devices
description: Ensure that all UI components render properly, are usable, and responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices for all user roles.

steps.description: Login as each role and navigate through key pages (dashboards, assessments, certificates, search, settings).
Verify UI components render correctly with proper layout and no visual glitches.
Resize browser or simulate devices to test responsiveness.
Verify content reflows appropriately and remains functional on different screen sizes.
Test critical interactive UI elements like buttons, dialogs, dropdowns, tables, and forms.
Verify elements respond to user interaction as expected without errors.
